verses.verse: וַ֭יַּעַן <WH6030> Then answered צֹפַ֥ר <WH6691> Zophar הַנַּֽעֲמָתִ֗י <WH5284> the Naamathite וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> and said
לָ֭כֵן <WH3651> Therefore שְׂעִפַּ֣י <WH5587> Therefore do my thoughts יְשִׁיב֑וּנִי <WH7725> cause me to answer וּ֝בַעֲב֗וּר <WH5668> because ח֣וּשִׁי <WH2363> and for [this] I make haste בִֽי׃

מוּסַ֣ר <WH4148> the check כְּלִמָּתִ֣י <WH3639> of my reproach אֶשְׁמָ֑ע <WH8085> I have heard וְ֝ר֗וּחַ <WH7307> and the spirit מִֽבִּינָתִ֥י <WH998> of my understanding יַעֲנֵֽנִי׃ <WH6030> causeth me to answer

הֲזֹ֣את <WH2063> you יָ֭דַעְתָּ <WH3045> Knowest מִנִּי־ <WH4480> from עַ֑ד <WH5703> thou [not] this of old מִנִּ֤י <WH4480> From שִׂ֖ים <WH7760> was placed אָדָ֣ם <WH120> since man עֲלֵי־ <WH5921> on אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> upon earth

כִּ֤י <WH3588> That רִנְנַ֣ת <WH7445> That the triumphing רְ֭שָׁעִים <WH7563> of the wicked מִקָּר֑וֹב <WH7138> [is] short וְשִׂמְחַ֖ת <WH8057> and the joy חָנֵ֣ף <WH2611> of the hypocrite עֲדֵי־ <WH5704> against רָֽגַע׃ <WH7281> instant

אִם־ <WH518> Though יַעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> mount up לַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> to the heavens שִׂיא֑וֹ <WH7863> Though his excellency וְ֝רֹאשׁ֗וֹ <WH7218> and his head לָעָ֥ב <WH5645> unto the clouds יַגִּֽיעַ׃ <WH5060> reach
כְּֽ֭גֶלֲלוֹ <WH1561> like his own dung לָנֶ֣צַח <WH5331> for ever יֹאבֵ֑ד <WH6> [Yet] he shall perish רֹ֝אָ֗יו <WH7200> they which have seen יֹאמְר֥וּ <WH559> him shall say אַיּֽוֹ׃ <WH335> Where

כַּחֲל֣וֹם <WH2472> as a dream יָ֭עוּף <WH5774> He shall fly away וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot יִמְצָא֑וּהוּ <WH4672> and shall not be found וְ֝יֻדַּ֗ד <WH5074> yea he shall be chased away כְּחֶזְי֥וֹן <WH2384> as a vision לָֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> of the night

עַ֣יִן <WH5869> The eye שְׁ֭זָפַתּוּ <WH7805> also [which] saw וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> no תוֹסִ֑יף <WH3254> him shall [see him] no more וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no ע֝֗וֹד <WH5750> longer תְּשׁוּרֶ֥נּוּ <WH7789> any more behold מְקוֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH4725> neither shall his place
בָּ֭נָיו <WH1121> His children יְרַצּ֣וּ <WH7521> shall seek to please דַלִּ֑ים <WH1800> the poor וְ֝יָדָ֗יו <WH3027> and his hands תָּשֵׁ֥בְנָה <WH7725> shall restore אוֹנֽוֹ׃ <WH202> their goods

עַ֭צְמוֹתָיו <WH6106> His bones מָלְא֣וּ <WH4390> are full [עֲלוּמֹו כ] (עֲלוּמָ֑יו <WH5934> youth ק) וְ֝עִמּ֗וֹ <WH5973> with עַל־ <WH5921> with עָפָ֥ר <WH6083> with him in the dust תִּשְׁכָּֽב׃ <WH7901> which shall lie down

אִם־ <WH518> Though תַּמְתִּ֣יק <WH4985> be sweet בְּפִ֣יו <WH6310> in his mouth רָעָ֑ה <WH7451> Though wickedness יַ֝כְחִידֶ֗נָּה <WH3582> [though] he hide תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under לְשׁוֹנֽוֹ׃ <WH3956> it under his tongue

יַחְמֹ֣ל <WH2550> [Though] he spare עָ֭לֶיהָ <WH5921> and וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and will not יַֽעַזְבֶ֑נָּה <WH5800> it and forsake וְ֝יִמְנָעֶ֗נָּה <WH4513> it not but keep it still בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> within חִכּֽוֹ׃ <WH2441> his mouth
לַ֭חְמוֹ <WH3899> [Yet] his meat בְּמֵעָ֣יו <WH4578> in his bowels נֶהְפָּ֑ךְ <WH2015> is turned מְרוֹרַ֖ת <WH4846> [it is] the gall פְּתָנִ֣ים <WH6620> of asps בְּקִרְבּֽוֹ׃ <WH7130> within

חַ֣יִל <WH2428> riches בָּ֭לַע <WH1104> He hath swallowed down וַיְקִאֶ֑נּוּ <WH6958> and he shall vomit them up again מִ֝בִּטְנ֗וֹ <WH990> of his belly יֽוֹרִשֶׁ֥נּוּ <WH3423> shall cast them out אֵֽל׃ <WH410> God
רֹאשׁ־ <WH7219> the poison פְּתָנִ֥ים <WH6620> of asps יִינָ֑ק <WH3243> He shall suck תַּֽ֝הַרְגֵ֗הוּ <WH2026> shall slay לְשׁ֣וֹן <WH3956> tongue אֶפְעֶֽה׃ <WH660> the viper's

אַל־ <WH408> does not יֵ֥רֶא <WH7200> He shall not see בִפְלַגּ֑וֹת <WH6390> the rivers נַהֲרֵ֥י <WH5104> the floods נַ֝חֲלֵ֗י <WH5158> the brooks דְּבַ֣שׁ <WH1706> of honey וְחֶמְאָֽה׃ <WH2529> and butter

מֵשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> for shall he restore יָ֭גָע <WH3022> That which he laboured וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and cannot יִבְלָ֑ע <WH1104> and shall not swallow [it] down כְּחֵ֥יל <WH2428> according to [his] substance תְּ֝מוּרָת֗וֹ <WH8545> [shall] the restitution וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot יַעֲלֹֽס׃ <WH5965> [be] and he shall not rejoice

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for רִ֭צַּץ <WH7533> Because he hath oppressed עָזַ֣ב <WH5800> [and] hath forsaken דַּלִּ֑ים <WH1800> the poor בַּ֥יִת <WH1004> an house גָּ֝זַ֗ל <WH1497> [because] he hath violently taken away וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> has not יִבֶנֵֽהוּ׃ <WH1129> which he builded

כִּ֤י ׀ <WH3588> Because לֹא־ <WH3808> no יָדַ֣ע <WH3045> Surely he shall not feel שָׁלֵ֣ו <WH7961> quietness בְּבִטְנ֑וֹ <WH990> in his belly בַּ֝חֲמוּד֗וֹ <WH2530> of that which he desired לֹ֣א <WH3808> no יְמַלֵּֽט׃ <WH4422> he shall not save

אֵין־ <WH369> Nothing שָׂרִ֥יד <WH8300> be left לְאָכְל֑וֹ <WH400> There shall none of his meat עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֝֗ן <WH3651> after that לֹא־ <WH3808> does not יָחִ֥יל <WH2342> therefore shall no man look טוּבֽוֹ׃ <WH2898> for his goods

בִּמְלֹ֣אות <WH4390> the fullness שִׂ֭פְקוֹ <WH5607> of his sufficiency יֵ֣צֶר <WH3334> he shall be in straits ל֑וֹ כָּל־ <WH3605> of everyone יַ֖ד <WH3027> every hand עָמֵ֣ל <WH6001> of the wicked תְּבוֹאֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH935> shall come

יְהִ֤י ׀ <WH1961> become לְמַלֵּ֬א <WH4390> [When] he is about to fill בִטְנ֗וֹ <WH990> his belly יְֽשַׁלַּח־ <WH7971> [God] shall cast בּ֭וֹ חֲר֣וֹן <WH2740> the fury אַפּ֑וֹ <WH639> of his wrath וְיַמְטֵ֥ר <WH4305> upon him and shall rain עָ֝לֵ֗ימוֹ <WH5921> and בִּלְחוּמֽוֹ׃ <WH3894> [it] upon him while he is eating

יִ֭בְרַח <WH1272> He shall flee מִנֵּ֣שֶׁק <WH5402> weapon בַּרְזֶ֑ל <WH1270> from the iron תַּ֝חְלְפֵ֗הוּ <WH2498> shall strike him through קֶ֣שֶׁת <WH7198> [and] the bow נְחוּשָֽׁה׃ <WH5154> of steel

שָׁלַף֮ <WH8025> It is drawn וַיֵּצֵ֪א <WH3318> and cometh out מִגֵּ֫וָ֥ה <WH1465> of the body וּ֭בָרָק <WH1300> yea the glittering sword מִֽמְּרֹרָת֥וֹ <WH4846> of his gall יַהֲלֹ֗ךְ <WH1980> cometh out עָלָ֥יו <WH5921> and אֵמִֽים׃ <WH367> terrors

כָּל־ <WH3605> Complete חֹשֶׁךְ֮ <WH2822> All darkness טָמ֪וּן <WH2934> [shall be] hid לִצְפּ֫וּנָ֥יו <WH6845> in his secret places תְּ֭אָכְלֵהוּ <WH398> shall consume אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> a fire לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not נֻפָּ֑ח <WH5301> not blown יֵ֖רַע <WH3415> him it shall go ill שָׂרִ֣יד <WH8300> with him that is left בְּאָהֳלֽוֹ׃ <WH168> in his tabernacle
יְגַלּ֣וּ <WH1540> shall reveal שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> The heaven עֲוֹנ֑וֹ <WH5771> his iniquity וְ֝אֶ֗רֶץ <WH776> and the earth מִתְקוֹמָ֘מָ֥ה <WH6965> shall rise up לֽוֹ׃

יִ֭גֶל <WH1540> shall depart יְב֣וּל <WH2981> The increase בֵּית֑וֹ <WH1004> of his house נִ֝גָּר֗וֹת <WH5064> [and his goods] shall flow away בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> in the day אַפּֽוֹ׃ <WH639> of his wrath

זֶ֤ה ׀ <WH2088> This חֵֽלֶק־ <WH2506> This [is] the portion אָדָ֣ם <WH120> man רָ֭שָׁע <WH7563> of a wicked מֵאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> from God וְנַחֲלַ֖ת <WH5159> and the heritage אִמְר֣וֹ <WH561> appointed מֵאֵֽל׃ <WH410> unto him by God פ
